protein.specific_function: A metalloprotease that may play a role in the inflammatory process and other reactions produced in response to injury or infection. May also play a role in the metabolism of the vasodilator bradykinin

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides

reference.reference_text: Venema RC, Ju H, Zou R, Venema VJ, Ryan JW: Cloning and tissue distribution of human membrane-bound aminopeptidase P. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1997 Oct 9;1354(1):45-8.
